meanings.definition: The process of becoming solid, as when a liquid turns into a solid.
meanings.sent1: The solidification of the ice cream made it hard and cold.
meanings.sent2: The solidification of the lava created new rock formations.
meanings.sent3: The solidification of the jello turned it into a wobbly treat.
meanings.sent4: The solidification of the idea in her mind made her determined.
meanings.sent5: The solidification of the chocolate in the fridge was a delicious transformation.

meanings.definition: The act of making something solid or firm.
meanings.sent1: The sculptor's solidification of the clay resulted in a beautiful statue.
meanings.sent2: The solidification of the foundation ensured the building's stability.
meanings.sent3: The solidification of the pudding made it a delightful dessert.
meanings.sent4: The solidification of their friendship made it unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The solidification of the contract made their agreement official.
